description_for_human: Access financial event calendar data from Mboum API, including earnings, IPOs, splits, dividends, and economic events.
description_for_model: This plugin provides access to the Mboum API's calendar events endpoints, allowing you to retrieve data about upcoming and past financial events. It supports earnings calendars, IPO calendars, stock splits, dividend payments, and economic event data.

endpoints.name: mboum_calendar_events
endpoints.description: Provides access to various calendar event data from Mboum API including earnings announcements, dividend schedules, IPOs, stock splits, and economic events.

info.title: Mboum Calendar Events API
info.description: Access financial event calendar data from Mboum API

post.summary: Get calendar event data from Mboum API

200.description: Successful response with calendar event data

endpoint.description: The specific calendar events endpoint to query

ticker.description: Stock symbol or comma-separated list of symbols to filter events (applicable for earnings, splits, dividends)

from.description: Start date for events in YYYY-MM-DD format

to.description: End date for events in YYYY-MM-DD format

date.description: Specific date for events in YYYY-MM-DD format (alternative to from/to range)

page.description: Page number for paginated results (starting from 1)

country.description: Country code to filter economic events (applicable for economic endpoint)

importance.description: Importance level of economic events (applicable for economic endpoint)
